name: Broken phone
description:
A game made for GGJ 2018. 

The game is called Broken Phone, it’s a childhood game that kids used to play. Kids would group up in a circle and start clockwise in turns whispering to each other ears a phrase that started from the first person and keep transmitting it to the other until it reaches the last person, the last child needs to guess the most logical phrase, or he would be wrong and lose the game. Hence the theme “transmission”.

The player will see 2 kids whispering to each other and a speech bubble above their head that hints a word from what they have said, after they are done, a question will come out “Guess the phrase” and 4 choice buttons will appear, it is also time restricted by 30 seconds. The player will need to choose one of those buttons for the right answer before the timer finishes.
